particlesystem "GameMajor" 1.00 
{  
	eventsequence "DieYao_ZhiLiaoShu01" 
	{
		particleType		        = PT_3D_PLANE
		meshRenderType		        = RT_REAL_COLOR
		Layer				= 26
		sourceblendmode		        = D3DBLEND_SRCALPHA
		destblendmode		        = D3DBLEND_DESTALPHA
		numparticles		        = 10
		gravity				= XYZ(0,200,0)
		emitradius		        = XYZ(random(-50,50),random(0,60),random(-50,50))
		lifetime			= 1
		EmitRate			= 60
		DrawCount		        = 1
		BillboardType		        = BT_NONE
		ZEnable			        = FALSE
		Triggertime                     = 1
		Trace			        = true

		initial				 texture	= "Light12.dds"
		initial			         color		= rgba(0.5,0.65,0.3,0)
		fade so from 0.1 to 0.5	         color		= rgba(0.55,0.85,0.3,2)
		fade so from 0.9 to 1	         color		= rgba(1,0.35,0.3,0)
		initial				 size		= XYZ(20,random(40,60),20)
		Fade so From 0 to 0.05		 size		= XYZ(30,random(70,150),30)
		Fade so From 0.5 to 1            size		= XYZ(10,random(60,320),10)
		initial			         rotate		= XYZ(0,0,0)
		initial			         velocity	= XYZ(0,0,0)
		fade so from 0.05 to 1           velocity	= XYZ(0,random(40,200),0)
	}
	eventsequence "DieYao_ZhiLiaoShu02" 
	{
		particleType		        = PT_3D_PLANE
		meshRenderType		        = RT_REAL_COLOR
		Layer				= 26
		sourceblendmode		        = D3DBLEND_SRCALPHA
		destblendmode		        = D3DBLEND_DESTALPHA
		numparticles		        = 20
		gravity				= XYZ(0,200,0)
		emitradius		        = XYZ(random(-20,20),random(20,110),random(-20,20))
		lifetime			= 0.5
		EmitRate			= 40
		DrawCount		        = 1
		BillboardType		        = BT_ALL
		ZEnable			        = FALSE
		Triggertime                     = 1
		Trace			        = true

		initial				 texture	= "SoftFlare.dds"
		initial			         color		= rgba(0.5,0.65,0.9,0)
		fade so from 0.1 to 0.3	         color		= rgba(0.2,1,0.1,0.5)
		fade so from 0.3 to 0.5	         color		= rgba(0.5,0.65,0.9,0)
		initial				 size		= XYZ(random(70,100),random(70,100),random(70,100))
		Fade so From 0 to 0.5		 size		= XYZ(random(140,200),random(140,200),random(140,200))
		initial			         rotate		= XYZ(0,0,random(0,70))
		Fade so From 0.1 to 0.5          rotate		= XYZ(0,0,20)
		initial			         velocity	= XYZ(0,0,0)
		fade so from 0.3 to 0.5          velocity	= XYZ(0,0,0)
	}
	eventsequence "DieYao_ZhiLiaoShu03" 
	{
		particleType		        = PT_3D_PLANE
		meshRenderType		        = RT_REAL_COLOR
		Layer				= 26
		sourceblendmode		        = D3DBLEND_SRCALPHA
		destblendmode		        = D3DBLEND_DESTALPHA
		numparticles		        = 5
		gravity				= XYZ(0,200,0)
		emitradius		        = XYZ(0,60,0)
		lifetime			= 1
		EmitRate			= 120
		DrawCount		        = 1
		BillboardType		        = BT_ALL
		ZEnable			        = FALSE
		Triggertime                     = 1
		Trace			        = true

		initial				 texture	= "Flower.dds"
		initial			         color		= rgba(0.5,0.65,0.3,0)
		fade so from 0.1 to 0.5	         color		= rgba(1,1,1,1)
		fade so from 0.9 to 1	         color		= rgba(1,0.35,0.3,0)
		initial				 size		= XYZ(12,12,12)
		Fade so From 0 to 0.05		 size		= XYZ(random(25,50),random(25,50),random(25,50))
		Fade so From 0.5 to 1            size		= XYZ(6,6,6)
		initial			         rotate		= XYZ(0,0,random(-180,180))
		Fade so From 0.1 to 0.5          rotate		= XYZ(0,0,random(-180,180))
		initial			         velocity	= XYZ(0,0,0)
		fade so from 0.05 to 1           velocity	= XYZ(random(-200,200),random(-200,200),random(-200,200))
	}	
	eventsequence "GameFight" 
	{
		particleType		= PT_2D_PLANE
		Layer				= 27
		sourceblendmode		= D3DBLEND_SRCALPHA
		destblendmode		= D3DBLEND_INVSRCALPHA
		numparticles		= 1
		gravity				= XYZ(0,0,0)
		emitrate			= 0
		emitradius			= XYZ(-300,400,0)
		LandPos				= 0
		UseLand				= false
		blackholepos		= xyz( 0,0,0 )
		RESOLUTIONCONVERT	= true
		
		lifetime			= 1.5
		initial texture		= "HQ_Fight.dds"
		initial size		= XYZ(300,300,1)
		
		initial			position	= XYZ(-300,400,0)
		fade so from 0 to 0.3	position	= XYZ(512,400,0)
		fade so from 0.8 to 1	position	= XYZ(1600,400,0)
	}

		particleType		= PT_3D_PLANE
		Layer			= 27
		sourceblendmode		= D3DBLEND_SRCALPHA
		destblendmode		= D3DBLEND_DESTALPHA
		numparticles		= 1
		gravity			= XYZ(0,0,0)
		emitradius		= XYZ(0,80,0)
		lifetime		= 0.15
		EmitRate		= 50
		BillboardType		= BT_All
		Trace			= false
		TRIGGERCOUNT		= 1
		DrawCount		= 1
		
		initial				texture		= "xuanmingjianfa111.dds"
		initial				size		= XYZ(250,250,250)
		fade so from 0.02 to 0.15       size		= XYZ(350,350,350)
		initial				rotate		= XYZ(0,0,random(0,360))
		initial				color		= rgba(0.6,0.2,1,2)
		fade so from 0.05 to 0.15       color		= rgba(0.4,0.2,1,0)
		initial				velocity	= XYZ(0,0,0)
	}

	{
		particleType		= PT_3D_PLANE
		Layer				= 26

		emitradius		= XYZ(random(-100,100),random(-100,100),random(-100,100))

		EmitRate		= 1000

		initial			texture		= "Yueling_smoke.dds"
		initial			color		= rgba(1,1,1,0)
		fade so from 0 to 0.1	color		= rgba(0.5,0.5,0.5,1)
		fade so from 0.3 to 0.6	color		= rgba(1,1,1,0)
		initial			size		= XYZ(200,200,1)
		fade so final		size		= XYZ(300,300,1)

		fade so final			rotate		= XYZ(0,0,-1500000)
	}

		emitradius		= XYZ(random(-10,10),random(-10,10),random(-10,10))
		lifetime		= random( 0.2, 0.4 )
		
		initial			texture		= "FlashGlowR.dds"
		initial			color		= rgba(1,1,1,1)
		fade so final		color		= rgba(1,1,1,0)
		initial			size		= XYZ(160,160,1)
		fade so final		size		= XYZ(80,80,1)
		initial			velocity	= XYZ(random(-1500,1500),random(-1500,1500),random(-1500,1500))
		fade so final		velocity	= XYZ(0,0,0)
		initial			rotate		= XYZ(0,0,random(0,360))
	}

	eventsequence "AttackPoisonPowder01"
	{
  		particleType  		= PT_3D_PLANE
  		meshRenderType  	= RT_REAL_COLOR  
  		Layer    		= 26
  		sourceblendmode  	= D3DBLEND_SRCALPHA

  		numparticles  		= 100

 		fade so from 0.001 to 0.15 color  	= rgba(1,1,1,0.5)
 		fade so from 0.3 to 0.5 color  		= rgba(1,1,1,0)

	{				
		particleType		= PT_3D_PLANE
		Layer				= 26
		sourceblendmode		= D3DBLEND_SRCALPHA
		destblendmode		= D3DBLEND_DESTALPHA
		numparticles		= 1
		lifetime		= 2
		emitrate		= 1000
		TriggerCount            = 1

		initial			  texture	= "AeroTornado04.dds"
		initial			  color		= rgba(1,1,1,0)
		fade so from 0 to 0.5	  color		= rgba(1,1,1,1)
		fade so from 0.5 to 2	  color		= rgba(1,1,1,0)
		initial			  size		= XYZ(400,400,1)
		initial			  rotate	= XYZ(0,0,0)
		fade so final		  rotate	= XYZ(0,0,360)
	}

	eventsequence "MonsterAngryWind"
	{		
		particleType		= PT_3D_PLANE
		meshRenderType		= RT_REAL_COLOR

		destblendmode		= D3DBLEND_DESTALPHA

		gravity			= XYZ(0,0,0)
		emitradius		= XYZ(0,0,0)
		UseLand			= true
		lifetime		= 0.3
		emitrate		= 100
		triggerCount		= 3
		BillboardType		= BT_all
		Drawcount		= 1


		initial				texture  = "Yueling_Ring2.dds"
		initial				color    = rgba(1,1,1,0)
		fade so from 0.001 to 0.075	color    = rgba(1,1,1,0.3)
		fade so from 0.2  to 0.3	color    = rgba(1,1,1,0)
		initial				size     = XYZ(300,300,1)
		fade so from 0.01 to 0.075	size     = XYZ(450,450,1)
	}

		fade so from 0.1 to 0.2		color		= rgba(1,1,1,0.6)
		fade so from 0.3 to 0.45	color		= rgba(1,1,1,0)
		initial				size		= XYZ(random(5,10),random(5,10),1)
		fade so from 0.2 to 0.5		size            = XYZ(random(1,5),random(1,5),1)
		initial				rotate		= xyz(0,0,random(-90,90))
		fade so final			rotate		= xyz(0,0,random(-90,90))
		initial				velocity	= XYZ(random(-1200,1200),random(-1200,1200),random(-1200,1200))
		fade so from 0.2 to 0.5		velocity	= XYZ(0,0,0)
	}

    	destblendmode    = D3DBLEND_DESTALPHA

    	emitradius     = XYZ(random(-20,20),random(-10,10),random(-20,20))
    	lifetime     = 0.8
		emitrate  = 20
		triggertime  = 2.5
    	BillboardType    = BT_all
    	initial texture  = "Gate_Light2.dds"
    	

    	initial        color   = rgba(1,1,1,0)
		fade so from 0.001 to 0.3  color    = rgba(1,1,1,0.5)
		fade so from 0.6 to 0.8  color    = rgba(1,1,1,0)
    	initial        size  = XYZ(random(150,200),random(150,200),1)
		fade so from 0.3 to 0.8  size            = XYZ(random(20,40),random(20,40),1)

		fade so Final    rotate  = XYZ(0,0,random(-45,45))
    	initial        velocity = XYZ(random(0,0),random(0,0),random(0,0))
	}

	eventsequence "Effect_Heart01" 
	{
		particleType		= PT_3D_PLANE
		Layer				= 26
		sourceblendmode		= D3DBLEND_SRCALPHA
		destblendmode		= D3DBLEND_DESTALPHA

		Trace			= true

		initial			color			= rgba(1,0.3,0.8,0.8)
		fade so from 9 to 10	color			= rgba(1,0.3,0.8,0)
		initial			rotate			= XYZ(0,0,0)
		initial			size			= XYZ(1,1,1)
		fade so from 0 to 0.1	size			= XYZ(250,150,1)
		fade so from 0.1 to 0.2	size			= XYZ(150,250,1)
		fade so from 0.2 to 0.3	size			= XYZ(240,160,1)

		particleType		= PT_3D_PLANE
		Layer				= 26
		sourceblendmode		= D3DBLEND_SRCALPHA
		destblendmode		= D3DBLEND_INVSRCALPHA
		numparticles		= 3
		gravity			= XYZ(0,0,0)
		emitradius		= XYZ(0,0,0)
		lifetime		= 0.4
		EmitRate		= 20
		DrawCount		= 1	
		Trace			= false
		BillboardType		= BT_NONE
		cullradius		= 2000
		TriggerCount		= 3

		initial				texture			= "Ring15_1.dds"
		at 0.1				texture			= "Ring15_2.dds"
		at 0.2				texture			= "Ring15_3.dds"
		at 0.3				texture			= "Ring15_4.dds"
		initial				color			= rgba(0,0,0,1)
		initial				size			= XYZ(800,800,1)
	}
	eventsequence "MoWu_KongDan_Blow01"

		BillboardType		= BT_NONE

		triggerTime		= 0.1

  		Fade so From 0.0 to 0.05	color		= rgba(0.1,0,0.3,1)
		Fade so From 0.1 to 0.3	        color		= rgba(0.1,0,0.3,0)

	}

	eventsequence "JianShi_DaDaoWuXing02" 
	{
		particleType		= PT_MESH
		meshRenderType		= RT_REAL_COLOR
		Layer			= 26
		sourceblendmode		= D3DBLEND_SRCALPHA
		destblendmode		= D3DBLEND_DESTALPHA
		numparticles		= 20
		gravity			= XYZ(0,0,0)
		emitradius		= XYZ(0,75,0)
		lifetime		= 0.3
		BillboardType		= BT_NONE
		Mesh			= "dadaowuxing01_Attack.Y"
		Trace			= false
		EmitRate		= 60
		ZEnable			= false
		cullradius		= 2000

	{
		particleType		= PT_3D_PLANE
  		meshRenderType		= RT_REAL_COLOR

		fade so from 0.12 to 1.6        size		= XYZ(random(300,500),random(300,500),random(300,500))
		initial				rotate		= XYZ(0,0,random(0,360))
		initial				color		= rgba(1,0.8,0.5,0)

		particleType		        = PT_3D_PLANE
		meshRenderType		        = RT_REAL_COLOR
		Layer				= 26
		sourceblendmode		        = D3DBLEND_SRCALPHA
		destblendmode		        = D3DBLEND_INVSRCALPHA
		numparticles		        = 100
		gravity				= XYZ(0,-3000,0)
		emitradius			= XYZ(random(-20,20),random(70,220),random(-20,20))
		lifetime			= 0.2
		EmitRate			= 120
		DrawCount		        = 1
		BillboardType		        = BT_ALL
		UseLand			        = true
		TRIGGERTIME	                = 2

		initial				 texture	= "stone.dds"
		initial			         color		= rgba(0,0.5,1,1)
		fade so from 0.02 to 0.05	 color		= rgba(0,0.4,1,1)
		fade so from 0.15 to 0.2	 color		= rgba(0,0.6,1,0)
		initial				 size		= XYZ(random(5,30),random(5,30),random(5,30))
		initial			         rotate		= XYZ(0,0,0)
		initial			         velocity	= XYZ(random(2000,3000),0,random(2000,3000))
	}
	eventsequence "Jinduanzhijian_01"  
	{
		particleType		= PT_3D_PLANE
		Layer			= 26
		sourceblendmode		= D3DBLEND_SRCALPHA
		destblendmode		= D3DBLEND_DESTALPHA
		numparticles		= 60
		gravity			= XYZ(0,-120,0)
		emitradius		= XYZ(random(-20,20),random(-10,10),0)
		lifetime		= 1
		BillboardType		= BT_ALL                         
		DrawCount		= 2
		emitrate		= 30
		TRIGGERTIME		= 99999
		
		initial				texture		= "Light01.dds"			
		initial				size		= XYZ(random(40,60),random(40,60),0)
		initial				color		= rgba(0,0.4,1,0)
		Fade so From 0.05  to 0.1	color		= rgba(0,0.6,1,1)
		Fade so From 0.1  to 0.2	color		= rgba(0,0.3,1,0.3)
		Fade so From 0.4  to 0.6	color		= rgba(0,0.6,1,1)
		Fade so From 0.8  to 1	        color		= rgba(0,0.4,1,0)
		initial				rotate		= XYZ(0,0,0)
		initial			        velocity	= XYZ(random(-40,40),random(-80,-120),random(-40,40))
		

	}

	eventsequence "Hundunshimo_dici01" 
	{
		particleType		= PT_3D_PLANE
		meshRenderType		= RT_REAL_COLOR
		Layer			= 25
		sourceblendmode		= D3DBLEND_SRCALPHA
		destblendmode		= D3DBLEND_INVSRCALPHA
		numparticles		= 1
		gravity			= XYZ(0,0,0)
		emitradius		= XYZ(0,80,0)
		lifetime		= 0.3
		BillboardType		= BT_ALL
		zEnable		= false
		ZWriteEnable	= true
		EmitRate		= 10000
		DrawCount		= 1.2
		TRIGGERTIME		= 0.1
		Trace			= false

		initial			        texture		= "Smoke18.dds"
		initial				color		= rgba(0.43,0.37,0.29,0)
		fade so from 0.0 to 0.15	color		= rgba(0.43,0.37,0.29,1)
		fade so from 0.15 to 0.3	color		= rgba(0.43,0.37,0.29,0)
		initial				size		= XYZ(380,480,380)
		fade so from 0.0 to 0.15	size		= XYZ(480,680,480)
		fade so from 0.15 to 0.3	size		= XYZ(550,880,550)
		initial				rotate		= XYZ(0,0,0)
		initial			        velocity	= XYZ(0,800,0)
	}

	{
		particleType		= PT_3D_PLANE
		meshRenderType		= RT_REAL_COLOR
		Layer			= 27
		sourceblendmode		= D3DBLEND_SRCALPHA
		destblendmode		= D3DBLEND_INVSRCALPHA
		numparticles		= 24
		gravity			= XYZ(0,0,0)
		emitradius		= XYZ(random(-10,10),80,1)
		lifetime		= 0.5
		BillboardType		= BT_ALL
		EmitRate		= 12
		DrawCount		= 1
		TRIGGERTIME		= 9999
		ZEnable			= true

		initial			        texture		= "Condense_Pulse01.dds"
		initial				color		= rgba(1,1,1,0)
		fade so from 0.05 to 0.1	color		= rgba(1,0.5,1,0.8)
		fade so from 0.3 to 0.5		color		= rgba(0,0,1,0)
		initial				size		= XYZ(250,250,250)
		fade so from 0.02 to 0.5	size		= XYZ(150,150,150)
		initial				rotate		= XYZ(0,0,random(0,360))
	}
	eventsequence "MoonRabbit_curse02" 
	{

		fade so from 0.01 to 0.2	   color	= rgba(1,1,1,1)
		fade so from 0.4 to 0.7	           color	= rgba(0.5,0.2,1,0)
		initial			           size		= XYZ(random(0.6,1.3),0.1,random(0.6,1.3))

	{

		fade so from 0.2 to 0.4		color		= rgba(1,1,1,0)

		particleType          = PT_3D_PLANE
		Layer                 = 27
		sourceblendmode       = D3DBLEND_SRCALPHA
		destblendmode         = D3DBLEND_DESTALPHA
		numparticles          = 15
		gravity               = XYZ(0,0,0)
		emitradius            = XYZ(0,0,0)
		lifetime              = 1
		BillboardType		= BT_ALL
		EmitRate              = 15
		TriggerTime           = 3
		DrawCount             = 1
		ZEnable			= false
		Trace			= FALSE

		initial                     texture        = "pattern042.dds"
		initial                     color          = rgba(0,1,0.5,0)
		fade so from 0.1 to 0.2   color          = rgba(0,1,0.5,1)
		fade so from 0.9 to 1    color          = rgba(0,1,0.5,0)
		initial                     size           = XYZ(20,20,1)
		fade so from 0.01 to 0.5   size           = XYZ(random(20,50),random(20,50),1)
		fade so from 0.5 to 1    size           = XYZ(10,10,1)
		initial				rotate		= XYZ(0,0,random(-180,180))
		fade so from 0.02 to 1           rotate		= XYZ(0,0,random(-180,180))
		initial			    velocity	        = XYZ(500,random(-300,300),random(-100,100))
		at  0.5                     velocity	        = XYZ(200,random(-400,400),random(-100,100))
	}

  		Fade so From 0.0 to 0.1		color		= rgba(1,1,1,1)
